  • Method Details

    • bVisit

      public static edu.reed.hypergraph.Bobject bVisit​(edu.reed.hypergraph.HyperGraph graph, java.util.HashSet<edu.reed.hypergraph.HyperNode> lsofNodes)
      Performs BVisit algorithm that checks to see which nodes in a HyperGraph are B-connected.

      This algorithm will determine which nodes can be reached from a set of source nodes. In order for the head set of a HyperEdge to be reached, the edge must be able to be traversed (ie. all of the nodes in the tail set must be present in the source set). The nodes that can be reached from a source set are said to be B-connected to the source set.

      Outlined in: Franzese N, Groce A, Murali TM, Ritz A (2019) Hypergraph-based connectivity measures for signaling pathway topologies. PLOS Computational Biology 15(10): e1007384. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pcbi.1007384.

      Parameters:
      graph - HyperGraph
      lsofNodes - Set of source nodes
      Returns:
      BObject which contains

      1. Set of B-connected Nodes

      2. Set of traversed HyperEdges

      3. Set of restricted HyperEdges (can be reached but not traversed)

    • bRelaxation

      public static java.util.Hashtable<edu.reed.hypergraph.HyperNode,​java.lang.Integer> bRelaxation​(edu.reed.hypergraph.HyperGraph graph, java.util.HashSet<edu.reed.hypergraph.HyperNode> lsofNodes)
      Performs BRelaxation algorithm outlined in paper. This algorithm will run BVisit on a HyperGraph multiple times to determine which nodes are B-Connected by relaxing what B-connectivity implies. It returns a dictionary of k-distance to reach a node in a HyperGraph. k-distance implies the number of times that B-visit has been run in order to reach the node in question. If a node cannot be reached, the distance listed will be the max integer value ie "infinity."

      Outlined in: Franzese N, Groce A, Murali TM, Ritz A (2019) Hypergraph-based connectivity measures for signaling pathway topologies. PLOS Computational Biology 15(10): e1007384. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pcbi.1007384.

      Parameters:
      graph - HyperGraph
      lsofNodes - Source set of nodes
      Returns:
      dictionary of distances

    • prevRhelp

      public static boolean prevRhelp​(java.util.HashSet<edu.reed.hypergraph.HyperEdge> rSet, java.util.Hashtable<edu.reed.hypergraph.HyperEdge,​java.lang.Boolean> seen)
      Checks to see if a HyperEdge has been seen.

      Helper function for BRelaxation algorithm to ensure that the while loop runs the proper amount of times. If a restricted HyperEdge has not been seen, then it will return true and the while loop will run.

      Parameters:
      rSet - Set of restricted HyperEdges
      seen - Dictionary of whether HyperEdges have been seen already
      Returns:
      boolean
